metadata.name: Code in Go
metadata.shortDescription: Assist developers coding in Go by enforcing team practices, SOLID principles, and Git workflow standards
metadata.description: This skill provides Go coding assistance while strictly enforcing team practices loaded from the local practices folder. It ensures code follows SOLID principles (SRP, DI), Go idioms, proper error handling, and Git workflow best practices including worktree usage and small, frequent commits.
objectives: Load and enforce Go coding practices from local practices folder
Ensure all generated code follows SOLID principles and Go idioms
Verify Git worktree setup before code modifications
Guide developers toward small, frequent commits
metadata.author: Windsurf AI

prompts.name: code-in-go
prompts.description: Main skill prompt for Go coding assistance with practice enforcement
